metadata.synopsis: Nested dialogue in which player can select which companion to dismiss in favour of recruiting another. In this dialogue, the player is speaking ONLY to the recruitee - the companion being dismissed does not speak at all.

32.speaker: Astarion, Gale, GROUP_Hirelings, Halsin, Jaheira, Karlach, Lae'zel, Minsc, Nightwarden Minthara, Shadowheart, Wyll
32.text: You know I'm up for it, but your party's a little full.

92.speaker: Astarion, Gale, GROUP_Hirelings, Halsin, Jaheira, Karlach, Lae'zel, Minsc, Nightwarden Minthara, Shadowheart, Wyll
92.text: Miniature as Boo is, he is also giant. You will need to make room for us, my friend.

83.speaker: Player
83.text: All right. Meet me at camp.

33.speaker: Astarion, Gale, GROUP_Hirelings, Halsin, Jaheira, Karlach, Lae'zel, Minsc, Nightwarden Minthara, Shadowheart, Wyll
33.text: Boo knows when Minsc is not wanted.

35.speaker: Astarion, Gale, GROUP_Hirelings, Halsin, Jaheira, Karlach, Lae'zel, Minsc, Nightwarden Minthara, Shadowheart, Wyll

66.speaker: Player
66.text: You can take Astarion's place - he'll stay here at camp.

91.speaker: Narrator
91.text: *Your companion is otherwise engaged. You'll need to dismiss them at a more convenient moment.*

52.speaker: Narrator
52.text: *Your companion is otherwise engaged. You'll need to dismiss them at a more convenient moment.*

15.speaker: Player
15.text: Gale could do with a rest.

3.speaker: Player
3.text: You can trade places with Wyll.

13.text: Take your time, my friend! Boo shall snooze a while longer.

61.speaker: Narrator
61.text: *But the vessel only stares blankly. You'll need to make room in your party, first.*
